website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses the competitors on value – comes with everything you need to convert a wall into attractive storage space.
pros: An all-inclusive 70-piece kit that comes with mounting hardware, hooks, and 2 13.5 x 22 in
Available in several colors to fit almost any decor
cons: Assembly is a bit challenging, considering there are a lot of small pieces and subpar instructions

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing sewing area
customer_reviews.text: I chose to separate the two pegboards and to place one horizontally and one vertically to better utilize space. I can get a lot on (and between) the two boards. The large cutting mat shown on the table in the picture hangs from a metal peg at the bottom of the pegboard on the left when I need to get it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Raskauskas

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box it had broken plastic piece that secures the tray to the peg board. ALSO, the spacer pieces are missing! None were in the box! You have to have them in order to mount the pegboard to the wall and keep it from slipping. I am SUPER disappointed. I am trying not to get out of the house, so I cannot go out to find replacement spacers ( if that is even possible) and I cannot hang the pegboard up without them. I guess I will have to return the item as it is both broken and incomplete! If I could give this a 0 I would.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of it and look until I continued to unpack it and found much of the plastic hooks for inserting into the pegboard were broken off, most disappointing were the broken ones on the bins so they can’t be hung (the bins being the reason I ordered this one). They’re definitely not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I do no have a ton of tools, but needed some place to put the ones I do have. I bought these because it was a fairly good priced option and I am not disappointed. It is made out of fairly cheap plastic so some holes are a bit tighter than others but not to the point that a little love can't get any of the items to go in place. I got it up on my wall, all the attachments come in great handy. For the price I do not think you can beat this pegboard and I will definitely get another when my collection of tools expands.
customer_reviews.author: JP2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for nerf gun storage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to organize my daughter's nerf guns, bullets, etc. We hung them one on top of the other on a wall in her closet that is dead space otherwise and it's perfect. These are lightweight but can hold a lot! Plus, she's thrilled that it's pink. I love that it comes with so many different hooks, because it can grow with her. If she doesn't want merfguns anymore, we can use it for jewelry or craft stuff.
customer_reviews.author: amyt

customer_reviews.title: For office / crafting use is great .
customer_reviews.text: Awesome easy to install and looks beautiful! The plating board is matte so it doesn’t look cheap and ugly or like plastic which was my fear . I would definitely recommend in the white . It comes with so many attachments I only ended up using these . I personally wouldn’t use it for tools in the garage but it is perfect for crafts since most things I need are light weight. It comes veeery well packaged but don’t be alarmed if these little white pegs are broken because you’re supposed to break them off as soon as you prepare to mount it .
customer_reviews.author: Luz mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for organizing my sewing supplies! A must have in my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was hesitant to purchase this set as it was a bit pricey, but really glad I did. I came with all the parts I need and was packaged really well. Was super easy to put up and I had it hanging in about 15 mins. Comes with plenty of attachments for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This pegboard was perfect for my sewing room. At first glance, I thought it would be too small to fit all of my things. Turns out, it was a perfect size with room to spare. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Booth

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT ORGANIZER FOR CRAFTS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS JUST WHAT I NEEDED TO ORGANIZE MY CRAFT SUPPLIES... IT ARRIVED IN GOOD SHAPE. COMES IN TWO PARTS WITH A LOT OF HARDWARE TO PUT IT UP WITH AND ALSO TO HANG ALL THE ITEMS YOU WOULD EVER WANT. HAS TWO BINS WITH DIVIDERS AND SEVERAL LITTLE CUPS WITH PEGS ATTACHED TO THEM. IT IS EASY TO PUT UP. I ORDERED TW OF THEM AND SO I HAD 4 PICES TO PUT UP ALL NEXT TO EACH OTHER TO MAKE ONE BIG SQUARE. I AM SO SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT. IT IS BLUE AND PRETTY AND OH SO CONVIENT TO USE.
customer_reviews.author: B. SNEED

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a baker
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my husband. I am a baker and have a small business out of my home kitchen. This was /is such a great gift. I have put everything I use daily on it and what a time saver to be able to just grab from the wall instead of open drawers or cabinets for every item I use each item. The only thing that would make this PERFECT would be covers on each of the cups that come with it. Flour and Powdered Sugar tend to make a dusty film in the cups. But nothing that a weekly wash can't take care of. LOVE THIS PEGBOARD.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite P. Lemar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Practial - but item was cracked when I opened it
customer_reviews.text: It is a lovely colour. I use on for all my hair products and the second one I use for my tools. It is so easy to find exactly what you are looking for when it is organized on a peg board. I am disappointed the company never got back to me when I sent them photos of one of the panels cracked in shipping. The panel is useable with the crack but I expected more because normally companies reach out when customers write in with photos of a problem. The price is high enough a consumer would be expecting the product to be 100% and the seller would answer acknowledging my damaged purchase.☹️
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my craft room
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed them very quickly when they arrived. He put one my our 6 year old's craft table and one by mine so that we each have a way to organize our craft items. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Farley

customer_reviews.title: This is great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of these. So glad I like it as much as I do. I put it by my long arm quilting machine to hold tools and things like templates. I was able to organize and clean up an area that was annoying to say the least. Now I have everything at my fingertips. The board is light made from plastic and has tons of thing that come with it to allow you to put and hang things. It worked out great for a craft and sewing area. It would not work out is an garage with heavy dirty tools. Perfect for the crafter.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This pegboard is better than I imagined. Perfect size for my workspace and excellent quantity and variety of accessories. The product arrived very well packaged and on time. When I bought it I thought it was a little more expensive than the others I had researched but it was worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Madiane

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. The little feet that hold the trays on to the peg board were completely broken off. I'm assuming it was a returned item because the broken pieces were packaged separately in the box already.
customer_reviews.author: Curly_G

customer_reviews.title: A Peg Board That Doesn't Overpower The Decor
customer_reviews.text: I am using this plastic pegboard for small tools I use in a compact work area in my den. It's easy to install with provided screws and sheet rock fasteners. It doesn't intrude on the basic decor in the room. I ended up purchasing sturdier tool holders, which I do for most peg board projects. The cups and bins are a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Wingman

customer_reviews.title: Nice item.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as expected except one of the clear containers was chipped in the corner. I ended up only using one of the clear containers. However the products is exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together. It’s perfect for organizing a space. I used mine for organizing my tools and accessories by my sewing table. It’s cleaned up the area and it’s great for easy access of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product - sturdy and looks nice too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of the clear pegboards and absolutely love them! I wish I had more wall space so I could buy more. Very sturdy. I'm using them to hang and organize props/supplies for photo shoots. I had two rather small wall spaces that I wanted to use for hanging items but could never find the right shelves or hooks. I have one sets hung one above the other on the wall (so it's like one tall pegboard). The other set I turned sideways and hung them that way. Fit both spaces perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: VWHITMORE

customer_reviews.title: Great pegboard!
customer_reviews.text: This has allowed me more space in a tight area of the room. I would very much recommend to others trying to organize their craft space.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra DiPasquale

customer_reviews.title: Pegboard for sewing supplies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sewing room. I put it next to my cutting table and have all scissors, marking items, rulers, etc on it. It's fantastic for a reasonable price, and very easy to put up. I am very satisfied with it, will probably buy another one for the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: gloriam

customer_reviews.title: Check bins before hanging
customer_reviews.text: One bin came cracked and did t notice until I hung the boards. Hoping to contact the company to just get the bin replaced. I really like it and works perfect for my sewing room
customer_reviews.author: Karen Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: It's really small
customer_reviews.text: The hooks and baskets as great as they may be are too big. The boards are just too small and barely put that much stuff on the system. Needs to be twice the size. I wouldn't go this small if you're looking for something.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I am always working at organizing my sewing space because I don't have a lot of room and this pegboard has made my life so much easier!! Everything is at my fingertips...no need to go searching through drawers...a winner!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Josephson

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are smaller than I imagined, but work perfectly where they are mounted. It comes with plenty of hooks. I purchased additional hooks that were not needed. The plastic cups won't hold up to a lot of abuse, but if care is given should last quite a while. I like that I can see through it. The board itself is sturdy, and will hold other things if the cups get broken.
customer_reviews.author: c niezTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything organized & within reach!
customer_reviews.text: Using in my sewing space! Works perfectly for hanging my cutters, scissors, measuring tapes, etc! Love this! Keeps everything handy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good pegboard.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Works exactly as I wanted. The only issue I have is that one of the plastic bins was broken when it arrived. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: kbdietrick

customer_reviews.title: Usefull storage for sewing supplies
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I can see my sewing notions at a glance. The plastic shelves/bins are flimsy; one peg broke immediately, or was broken when I received it (see photo). Other than that flaw, I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: So organized!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this 5 stars however one of the plastic bins arrived shattered. Otherwise, this looks great and keeps everything super organized!
customer_reviews.author: K. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a sewing studio/room
customer_reviews.text: This Azar peg board is perfect for a sewing room or studio. It holds all those items that tend to get lost here and there. It was easy to install and it looks very nice. I plan to buy another for the sewing/serger area of my room. I'm thrilled with it and it is helping me keep the things I use often right at hand. Another thing I like about this is it comes in colors and also has lots of accessory hangers. I can't say anything bad about it and I'm thrilled I found it!
customer_reviews.author: S. Laflamme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids art area
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Wishing more plastic pieces came as they look nicer than the metal ones. And the compartments are great. Again, I wish more were included as they’re expensive to purchase individually. Overall a great product for organizing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Betro

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! I really wanted something to help organize my work room. I'm huge on organization and efficiency, and this baby delivers exactly what I needed! I love that I have everything in arms reach.
customer_reviews.author: khrJones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and accessories. Perfect for organizing a craft room.
customer_reviews.author: B Senkle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t clearly read the description. Pegboard is plastic.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for what I needed it for. The only thing is that I didn’t pay attention to the description & had no idea this was plastic. I think it’s a bit expensive for plastic but that was on me for not reading.
customer_reviews.author: Ja'Niyah White-Humes

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PEGBOARD ORGANIZER
customer_reviews.text: I searched the web for a long time trying to find an organizer for my scrap book stuff and also for my kids arts and craft projects. I finally found it from this company called Azar and it is awesome. It is made very well and I love that I can move around the accessories to make a custom organizer for really great price. Now my husband wants to order one for his tools too! It was easy to hang on the wall. Also the colors are great, I love them all and had a hard time deciding which one to buy! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Lady 2010

customer_reviews.title: Great fix for helping organize the Sewing Room!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to hang machine embroidery thread in my sewing room. I didn't want to use solid shelving because I thought it would make the small room feel even smaller. It worked so well that I've since purchased more of these pegboards in different sizes from Azar Displays to hang stabilizer fabric rolls, in-progress projects and multiple hoops...
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Ladner

customer_reviews.title: It’s lit fam
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job of keeping my fly tying materials organized and handy but it is is not worth what I paid for it. Materials are cheap and IMO it should cost no more than $35
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight. Love the color.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wished it came with more plastic hooks instead of the metal ones.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Finanlly organized my makeup.
customer_reviews.text: I use this pegboard kit to organize my makeup. I now have space and can see all the makeup I have. There is a lot of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: A Really Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pegboard, but that's just it - I wish it were a little bigger. My computer desk has only one drawer, and this pegboard holds as much as three or so drawers would hold, without looking messy. I ordered another pegboard for my sewing area but ordered a different brand. It is a larger metal white pegboard, and it is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: An everyday average woman.

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this in two different homes, and it is just as sturdy and vibrant as it was when it first came in the mail. It's incredibly easy to set up and so versatile. I use it for jewelry, nail polish, various cables and cords, q-tips, cotton balls, and pretty much everything else. It's great for the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ilyena

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It broke when trying to get it out of the box, it was extremely small not at all like what was pictured. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Regina Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these boards
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these boards. Much better size for arts and crafts (my wife quilts) than something you would find at a home improvement store meant for garage or garden storage.
customer_reviews.author: happypop

customer_reviews.title: Pegboard room orgainizer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my scrapbook room and so far I love it. Very easy to install and all the pieces are well made and easy to use. Quite a few items can be hung with out crowding. There are more than enough different hangers for whatever the use as well as plenty of each one. Considering buying a couple more for the garage to hang tools.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafts
customer_reviews.text: So far so good- expensive for plastic but tons of variations of hooks came with it. I’m only using it for my painting supplies so I don’t need ultra tuff stuff. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I am now addicted!!!
customer_reviews.text: With the Pegboard system, not only am I super organized, but I can easily put the Pegboard up myself-quite the liberating feat for this gal! I have managed to find uses for it in almost every room in my house. Get creative and go for it! Not only is it fun, but you will be the envy of the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: veronica disney

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Too many little pieces not enough instructions Not complicated but I was disappointed in the product due to all the small pieces and the product not clarifying what pieces are for hanging the pegboard and what pieces are for organization
customer_reviews.author: rosesped

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe I wasted so long to get this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It went together with ease. Now I need another one!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: love how it looks in my kitchen with pots pans and my main measuring cups hanging. A little smaller than I was thinking but I can order more slabs of peg boards to make it bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Canomomma4

customer_reviews.title: Chic Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: LOVE!!! It comes with way more accessories than you can ever use at the same time & some I have no idea how to use. Can't wait to buy more so I can put them everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: DIYQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great closet organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to organize my necklaces in our walk-in closet. Looks great and keeps everything in sight, organized, and tangle-free. I love this product! Am going to order a second set for my barbeque items in the garage. Great way for keeping everything at hand and organized.
customer_reviews.author: donnacooksalot

customer_reviews.title: scrapbooking must have
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in a magazine and ordered it for my scrapbooking room. It is a great product and a must have, you can see everything so easy it is effortless to put up also and you can configure it however you like. I love it, I can also see many other possible functionality for it for any crafter of other sorts.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lightener

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Purple is my favorite color! Used this to organize my dresser. Placed one piece on each side of my mirror. One side is holding all my bracelets (lots!) and the other has the compartments and it holds my necklaces and my makeup. Very easy to put up and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lowery

customer_reviews.title: great for crafters!
customer_reviews.text: I have this pegboard in my craft room. I like that it is plastic and looks better than the pressboard stuff. I also love the accessories that came with it - the bins and little cups. Super functional!
customer_reviews.author: KiminAL

customer_reviews.title: I am thrilled with this kit!
customer_reviews.text: In short, this is a fantastic kit. While the pegboard is smaller than the sheets you can buy in a hardware, I nevertheless had no trouble getting all of the clutter off my work table and onto these two boards. The pegboard is easy to install (all mounting hardware is included) and the kit includes dozens of hooks and hangers; I used only a fraction of the hooks that were enclosed. This kit far exceeded my expectations, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy another should an organizing need arise.
customer_reviews.author: K. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: We use the peg board to hold our crafting supplies. It's super cute and adjustable and the "look" fits perfectly in our crafting work space. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: SoPhancy

customer_reviews.title: Like the colored pegboard
customer_reviews.text: Like the colored pegboard, looks great in my craft room. Really did not need all the accessories that come with it. Tried to find just the colored acrylic pegboard without all the extra's, I would buy more..!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my craft closet. I love it!! I still have so many peg attachments left!!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Girl

customer_reviews.title: Best jewelry organizer EVER
customer_reviews.text: My friends want one now! I also bout the Azar 800020 Clear Lexan Plastic Bracelet Bar and it works great with this set. I can move the pegs around for longer/shorter lengths. Really, this is the best jewelry organizer ever!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Better packaging required.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I received this item damaged (see photo), I still think it was a good deal considering it was the perfect size and all the accessories. I think think when dealing with clear acrylic it's probably a good idea to use bubble wrap, because let's be honest: crack is whack, yo.
customer_reviews.author: Josef Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Works great for my sewing and crafting area! It was super easy to install and came with lots of different hook options!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Lennon

customer_reviews.title: cracked plastic container.
customer_reviews.text: one of the plastic trays was cracked when it arrived. seems like the plastic containers are really for light weight stuff.. stationary ? but cannot hold weight.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing so much. Everything fits on it perfectly and theres so many options!
customer_reviews.author: ANgiE

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this product. The cups and bins are great for storing small loose items and there are way more hooks that come with this package than I will ever need. It is sturdy on the wall for items I have to store, small craft items like scissors, pens and markers in the cups, several bottles of glue, ribbons, strands of beads. Everything is at my fingertips. The only draw back is that the holes were not pre drilled. It added a step when installing, but in the end it worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Raimondo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sewing room
customer_reviews.text: I love this clear pegboard for my new sewing/craft room. It is perfect for organiziing my sewing scissors and supplies. The system was easy for my handy hubby to install; and I love that I can see the cheerful green of my wall through the clear pegboard. The assortment of bins and pegs included was more than sufficient. I am very pleased with the quality of this product and would recommend it to anyone outfitting a sewing or craft room. What a joy to be able to find everything at a glance! As always, shipping from Amazon was fast and everything arrived in perfect order.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha B.

customer_reviews.title: fabulous idea
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Tempted to buy more to make it a larger display. Everyone comments on it when they visit. This is a must have for anyone with loads of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Enalyesac

customer_reviews.title: Clear pegboard
customer_reviews.text: Great boards, love the clear display. Just wish there were a few more longer metal pegs with it. The assortment was ok, just not what I really needed but a good assortment of various pegs etc. Easy to place on wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs R E Mckeown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got this hung in my Harley Davidson room, which is also my craft room. I love that everything is all organized and in one spot now.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: A good ourchase
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pegboar, I am not a crafty person and did not feel like going to the hardware store and putting one together from scratch. It is very sturdy, looks nice in my closet, and keeps my jewelry from getting tangled and broken. I can also hang my small purses from the bottom
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: ended up using it for jewelry and it is AWESOME! Hang your necklaces and put bangles and rings ...
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this for my craft room, ended up using it for jewelry and it is AWESOME! Hang your necklaces and put bangles and rings and earrings in the containers at the bottom!
customer_reviews.author: RuthAnn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comes with lots of attachments
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and sturdy! Perfect size for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very useful to organize stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very useful to organize stuff, one thing I did is drill hole in each corner to fix the panel to max the space usage, other than that, no compliance.
customer_reviews.author: SimonZ

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The dividers in the organizers didn't even fit so I could use them. It did what I needed it to do, but was expecting higher quality...
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great space safer and easy access to my kitchen tools, price, and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Pegboard organizer
customer_reviews.text: The hooks and other holders don't stay in when you remove the tool, unless you remember to hold them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this "craft room" pegboard system when I was looking for conventional pegboard. It came in no time at all and assembled beautifully. There are all sorts of hooks and doo dads (the trays are awesome!) and plenty of them so its easy to customize. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hines

customer_reviews.title: Nice for inside storeage
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 sets of these. I use them to store my Embroidery thread on. They look very nice for inside use.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in the space I have. It was very easy to install. Would get another if I had room.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Braxton-Brown

customer_reviews.title: pegboard room organizer
customer_reviews.text: i have 4 of these boards. use them for organizing in my garage. they look great. lots of attachments to help you stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Up on the wall & working for me already. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: dawabbit

customer_reviews.title: Pegboard organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this pegboard. Ordered because of ease of installation and all the items included in the set. Loved the color as well. I installed like a backwards L because of my room construction. It works great! Have only one suggestion. The screw anchors included were a bright royal blue and I purchased off white to work with my off white walls. The set of pegboards organized three boxes for me.
customer_reviews.author: bjl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: The product was great for Scrapbooking. It has several compartments for storing items. I loved that it was pink, it matched my theme.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: perfect for sewing room
customer_reviews.text: Great product to organize all those small articles that I can never find when I need them. Attractive - easy to install - fabulous accessories - great price !!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Pentheny

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to sewing room
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pegboard in white, looks great in my sewing room. Took only a few minutes to hang. I do wish the panels were a tad bigger...maybe I just have too much junk! I do think it is alittle pricey for what it is but I love my tools being origanized and easy to find when I need them. Very happy I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for small items!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pegboard for my sewing room. Directions for hanging were clear and easy to understand. It is sturdy and holds many small sewing items in all of the many hooks and cups and trays provided. Love the different colors it comes in, too!
customer_reviews.author: Granny of Two

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! It was missing 1 hook but everything is sturdy and sound. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carlos arzate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this for me for my birthday and I was so excited when I found out! Purple is my favorite color so I loved it at first sight. It was super easy to install, just a few screws in each corner and it's ready to go. There are a ton of pegs in different styles which make customizing it exactally how you want it a breeze. It fits tons of products on it and I love the hanging baskets for loose items.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: Pink Pegboard
customer_reviews.text: The pink pegboard is exactly what I wanted. It went up really easy and holds all of my scrapbooking tools.
customer_reviews.author: sandya

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than I expected. I'm definitely going to get more for other rooms in my house!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic organizer
customer_reviews.text: This little beauty is a lifesaver! I have the most ORGANIZED work area now and can still enjoy the wall color. It is much more public friendly and not the typical brown garage style pegboard! Sturdy and hold a variety of items. The best part is that everything you need AND MORE is included! There are a HUGE assortment of hanger types, containers, dividers...WONDERFUL! I am so pleased with this item!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Longstreth

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I have alot of jewelry and this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I have alot of jewelry and this organizes everything!!! I ordered the purple. If a pegboard can be pretty then this is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gram Bee

customer_reviews.title: No more clutter!
customer_reviews.text: My craft/sewing room is so organized now. My sister had to purchase one just like mine. No more clutter all over the tables! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Sewing Room!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and comes with various sized hooks and pegs to hang things. Love this for my sewing tools!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Check the dimensions
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to the dimensions. It was much smaller than I expected. It worked out just fine though. The quality was great!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: A great organizing tool, would recommend to anyone considering one! Very useful in the sewing room, mounted on the wall easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Utility closet looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this to organize my large utility closet. I bought three panels for one wall in the closet. Now everything has a place... From light bulbs to commonly used hand tools and assorted sizes of nails and screws, my closet looks good and everything is off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ag Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I like this item for my sewing / craft room. I have not finished loading it as room is a work in progress. I found it to be good size for my needs. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrilyn H.

customer_reviews.title: Who knows what the pictures and parts really mean except they don't go together to make what I thought I was buying
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a cost-effective organizer for my craft room. Unfortunately, it doesn't come with any worthwhile set up instructions. The instructions seem to refer to holes that don't exist because they were filed in with plastic. The metal parts that came with the set are unexplained and mysterious. We've drilled out the holes and attached them to the walls, but this is a very inelegant solution. Once you get the pegboards up, there are a selection of mounting options using the pegboard. But putting the pegboards up is an exercise in frustration. There are better options out there, including purchasing pegboards from the box store and doing this yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it was perfect for the space I had and less bulky then a regular pegboard.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Amendolaro

product_meta.title: Azar Displays 70-PIECE PEGBOARD ORGANIZER KIT (2-13.5" X 22")
product_meta.description:
Get your tools and work space in order with the PINK 900945-PNK Pegboard Frosted Craft Center and Scrapbook Organizer. Made from durable frosted plastic, these versatile wall mounted panels will blend in with any wall space and provide a stylish solution for all that unwanted clutter. Clear off table space at home or in the shop and easily find the tools and accessories needed to get the job done. Pegboard Organizing Kit includes every accessory needed to manage any workspace and create practical storage options with 70 pieces and accessories. The Pegboard Panel System will install very easily on any flat surface. Craft Center and Scrapbook Organizer Panel System includes: 2 pcs. Durable PINK Plastic Pegboard Panels (13.5 by 22 ea.) 2 pcs. Divider Bins with 6 Dividers 2 pcs. Plastic Cups 6 pcs. Metal U-Hooks 4 pcs. Plastic U-Hooks 4 pcs. Metal J-Hooks 4 pcs. Metal s-Hooks 10 pcs. Metal Prong Hooks 6 pcs. 2 inch All-wire Galvanized Hooks 4 pcs. 4 inch All-wire Galvanized Hooks 4 pcs. 2 inch Plastic Hooks 4 pcs. 4 inch Plastic Hooks 12 pcs. Mounting Hardware Screws
